com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.naming.AbstractNameCheck
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAccessControlNameCheck, CatchParameterNameCheck, ClassTypeParameterNameCheck, InterfaceTypeParameterNameCheck, LambdaParameterNameCheck, LocalFinalVariableNameCheck, LocalVariableNameCheck, MethodTypeParameterNameCheck, ParameterNameCheck
public abstract class AbstractNameCheck
extends AbstractCheck
Abstract class for checking that names conform to a specified format.

      protected abstract boolean mustCheckName​(DetailAST ast)
      Decides whether the name of an AST should be checked against the format regexp.
      Parameters:
      ast - the AST to check.
      Returns:
